QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 1. Most New Testament events occurred in:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Judea, Galilee, Samaria|B. Persia, Babylon|C. Iran, Iraq|D. Spain, Lebanon|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 2. The total number of books in the New Testament is:
3. New Testament books are divided into the following categories:
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Gospels, history, epistles, prophecy|B. Law, history poetry, prophecy|C. Neither of these|D. Both of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 4. Match each Jewish sect: Pharisees
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Did not believe in the resurrection|B. Looked for two messiahs to come|C. Believed in the resurrection|D. Gentiles|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 5. Match each Jewish sect: Sadducees
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Did not believe in the resurrection|B. Looked for two messiahs to come|C. Believed in the resurrection|D. Gentiles|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 6. Match each Jewish sect: Essences
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Did not believe in the resurrection|B. Looked for two messiahs to come|C. Believed in the resurrection|D. Gentiles|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 7. Match each book with the correct author: Romans
8. Match each book with the correct author: I and II Corinthians
9. Match each book with the correct author: I and II Thessalonians
10. Match each book with the correct author: Galatians
11. Match each book with the correct author: Ephesians
12. Match each book with the correct author: Philippians
13. Match each book with the correct author: Colossians
14. Match each book with the correct author: I and II Timothy
15. Match each book with the correct author: Titus
16. Match each book with the correct author: Philemon
17. Match each book with the correct author: Hebrews
18. Match each book with the correct author: James
19. Match each book with the correct author: I and II Peter
20. Match each book with the correct author: I, II, and III John
21. Match the event: Raising of Lazarus from the dead
22. Match the event: Birth place of Jesus
23. Match the event: Where John baptized people
24. Match the event: Where Jesus met the woman at the well
25. Match the event: Where Jesus was crucified
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Island of Patmos|B. Gethsemane|C. Golgotha|D. Mount of Olives|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 26. Match the event: Where John wrote Revelation
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Island of Patmos|B. Gethsemane|C. Golgotha|D. Mount of Olives|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 27. Match the event: Jesus ascended to Heaven from here
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Island of Patmos|B. Gethsemane|C. Golgotha|D. Mount of Olives|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 28. Match the event: Jesus prayed here
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Island of Patmos|B. Gethsemane|C. Golgotha|D. Mount of Olives|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 29. Match the books with the correct New Testament division: Matthew, Mark, Luke and John
30. Match the books with the correct New Testament division: Acts
31. Match the books with the correct New Testament division: Romans
32. Match the books with the correct New Testament division: I and II Corinthians
33. Match the books with the correct New Testament division: I and II Thessalonians
34. Match the books with the correct New Testament division: Galatians
35. Match the books with the correct New Testament division: Ephesians
36. Match the books with the correct New Testament division: Philippians
37. Match the books with the correct New Testament division: Colossians
38. Match the books with the correct New Testament division: I and II Timothy
39. Match the books with the correct New Testament division: Titus
40. Match the books with the correct New Testament division: Philemon
41. Match the books with the correct New Testament division: Hebrews
42. Match the books with the correct New Testament division: James
43. Match the books with the correct New Testament division: I and II Peter
44. Match the books with the correct New Testament division: I, II, and III John
45. Match the books with the correct New Testament division: Jude
46. Match the books with the correct New Testament division: Revelation
47. Match each book with the best description: Record of the early Church.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. The Gospels|B. Acts|C. Revelation|D. None of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 48. Match each book with the best description: Vision of future things.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. The Gospels|B. Acts|C. Revelation|D. None of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 49. Match each book with the best description: Story of the life and ministry of Jesus.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. The Gospels|B. Acts|C. Revelation|D. None of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 50. Match each book to the best description: Orderly church government.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Philemon|B. Titus|C. I, II, III John|D. None of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 51. Match each book to the best description: Intercession for a runaway slave.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Philemon|B. Titus|C. I, II, III John|D. None of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 52. Match each book to the best description: Emphasizes love and fellowship.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Philemon|B. Titus|C. I, II, III John|D. None of these|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 53. Matching: Match each book to the best description: Instructions for a young minister.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. I and II Timothy|B. Hebrews|C. James|D. I and II Peter|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 54. Matching: Match each book to the best description: Comfort in suffering.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. I and II Timothy|B. Hebrews|C. James|D. I and II Peter|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 55. Matching: Match each book to the best description: Jesus is the great high priest.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. I and II Timothy|B. Hebrews|C. James|D. I and II Peter|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 56. Matching: Match each book to the best description: Faith, works, and the tongue.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. I and II Timothy|B. Hebrews|C. James|D. I and II Peter|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 57. Matching: Match each book to the best description: Deals with error of mixing law and faith.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. I and II Thessalonians|B. Colossians|C. Ephesians|D. Galatians|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 58. Matching: Match each book to the best description: Deals with Gnosticism.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. I and II Thessalonians|B. Colossians|C. Ephesians|D. Galatians|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 59. Matching: Match each book to the best description: Your heavenly position in Jesus.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. I and II Thessalonians|B. Colossians|C. Ephesians|D. Galatians|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 60. Matching: Match each book to the best description: Christian living and the return of Jesus.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. I and II Thessalonians|B. Colossians|C. Ephesians|D. Galatians|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 61. Matching: Match each book to the best description: Written to correct problems in the local church.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Romans|B. I and II Corinthians|C. Philippians|D. Jude|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 62. Matching: Match each book to the best description: Stresses salvation by faith.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Romans|B. I and II Corinthians|C. Philippians|D. Jude|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 63. Matching: Match each book to the best description: A warning against false doctrine.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Romans|B. I and II Corinthians|C. Philippians|D. Jude|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 64. Matching: Match each book to the best description: Emphasizes the joy of the Christian experience.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Romans|B. I and II Corinthians|C. Philippians|D. Jude|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 65. Match each person with the correct description: I watched Stephen being stoned.
66. Match each person with the correct description: I wrote the book of Acts.
67. Match each person with the correct description: My husband and I dropped dead.
68. Match each person with the correct description: I was the mother of Jesus.
69. Match each person with the correct description: I wrote the book of Revelation.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Philip|B. John the Baptist|C. John the Apostle|D. Barnabas|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 70. Match each person with the correct description: I ministered to an unnamed eunuch.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Philip|B. John the Baptist|C. John the Apostle|D. Barnabas|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 71. Match each person with the correct description: I was a forerunner of Christ.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Philip|B. John the Baptist|C. John the Apostle|D. Barnabas|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 72. Match each person with the correct description: I traveled with Paul in ministry.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Philip|B. John the Baptist|C. John the Apostle|D. Barnabas|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 73. Match each person with the correct description: I was the first martyr.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Mary Magdalene|B. Stephen|C. Judas|D. Silas|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 74. Match each person with the correct description: I was in jail with Paul.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Mary Magdalene|B. Stephen|C. Judas|D. Silas|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 75. Match each person with the correct description: Jesus cast seven devils out of me.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Mary Magdalene|B. Stephen|C. Judas|D. Silas|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 76. Match each person with the correct description: I betrayed Jesus.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Mary Magdalene|B. Stephen|C. Judas|D. Silas|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 77. Match each person with the correct description: I denied Jesus.
78. Match each person with the correct description: I would not believe unless I touched Jesus.
79. Match each person with the correct description: I tried to kill Jesus at birth.
80. Match each person with the correct description: I was the earthly father of Jesus.
81. Match each person with the correct description: I was formerly a tax collector.
82. Match each person with the correct description: I washed my hands of Christ's blood.
83. Match each person with the correct description: I was raised from the dead.
84. Match each person with the correct description: I was set free instead of Jesus.
85. Match each person with the correct description: I was the mother of John the Baptist.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Zacchaeus|B. Nicodemus|C. Elizabeth|D. Simon of Cyrene|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 86. Match each person with the correct description: I came to Jesus to discuss eternal life.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Zacchaeus|B. Nicodemus|C. Elizabeth|D. Simon of Cyrene|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 87. Match each person with the correct description: I climbed a tree to see Jesus.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Zacchaeus|B. Nicodemus|C. Elizabeth|D. Simon of Cyrene|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 88. Match each person with the correct description: I carried the cross for Christ.
QUESTIONRECORD.A: A. Zacchaeus|B. Nicodemus|C. Elizabeth|D. Simon of Cyrene|

QUESTIONRECORD.Q: 89. The New Testament totally did away with Old Testament law.
90. The New Testament teaches we should still sacrifice animals for sin.
91. The New Testament fulfills many Old Testament prophecies.
92. The world will continue to get better and better until the time Jesus returns.
93. Believers are commissioned with the responsibility of spreading the Gospel to the world.
94. No man knows the exact day and hour of Christ's return.
95. The New Testament teaches there are many ways to approach God.
96. The New Testament teaches that good works are necessary for salvation.
97. Love for God and others are the greatest New Testament commandments.
98. There were no actual appearances of Jesus on earth after His resurrection from the dead.
99. I completed reading the text for this course.
100. I completed the self-tests at the end of each chapter.
